meanings.sent1: The kind teacher's actions were praiseworthier than expected.
meanings.sent2: The beautiful sunset was truly praiseworthier than words can describe.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to catch a laser pointer was praiseworthier than successful.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her craft was praiseworthier than gold.
meanings.sent5: The hero's bravery in the face of danger was praiseworthier than any tale.

meanings.definition: More deserving of praise than something else
meanings.sent1: The new book was praiseworthier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: Her efforts in the project were praiseworthier than his.
meanings.sent3: The dog's attempt to speak was praiseworthier than the cat's.
meanings.sent4: His leadership skills were praiseworthier than anyone else's in the team.
meanings.sent5: The student's improvement was praiseworthier than anyone had anticipated.
